name: sbcid

stmt.origin: bitr3i(wsbc(s0, cv(s0), w0), w0, wsb(s0, s0, w0))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, cv(s0), w0), w0)

-| wb(wsb(s0, s0, w0), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, cv(s0), w0), w0)
-| wb(wsb(s0, s0, w0), wsbc(s0, cv(s0), w0))
-| wb(wsb(s0, s0, w0), w0)

body.origin: |- wb(wsb(s0, s0, w0), wsbc(s0, cv(s0), w0))

comment: An identity theorem for substitution. See ~ sbid . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Feb-2017.)
